name: perl-metacpan-client

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description: A comprehensive, DWIM-featured client to the MetaCPAN API

dependencies.name: perl
dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.

dependencies.name: perl-json-maybexs
dependencies.description: Use Cpanel::JSON::XS with a fallback to JSON::XS and JSON::PP

dependencies.name: perl-moo
dependencies.description: Moo - Minimalist Object Orientation (with Moose compatibility)

dependencies.name: perl-safe-isa
dependencies.description: Call isa, can, does and DOES safely on things that may not be objects

dependencies.name: perl-test-fatal
dependencies.description: Incredibly simple helpers for testing code with exceptions

dependencies.name: perl-test-needs
dependencies.description: Skip tests when modules not available.
